resources.string: Standard: Opens destination screen with back button to Main/Parent
Special: Opens one shot, single task destination screen, back goes where user was
Deeplink: System will look for a suitable App to open the provided URL (Default)
Big Text: Large-format notifications that include a lot of text (Default)

Big Picture: Large-format notifications that include a large image attachment. 
Recommended sizes:
 - Minimum - 512x256
 - Balanced - 1024x512
 - Maximum - 2048x1024
 Ratio - 2:1
Inbox: Large-format notifications that include a list of (up to 5) strings.
Custom: Notification style for custom views that are decorated by the system.
